data.what_is:
Paragon's user-friendly marketing platform MarketingOne is versatile and streamlines processes, saving you time and money. Continuously improved and updated to keep it up to scratch.

MarketingOne is the marketing software suite where marketing and compliance meet. A platform that has been tried and refined over the years. It is designed to be useful in many different types of businesses and applications. Users benefit from time and cost savings as it provides consistency across media channels and assets.

MarketingOne's modules enhance the efficiency of your marketing efforts, from planning and execution to evaluation.
 The platform allows you to coordinate all your marketing materials nationally and internationally while allowing for local adaptations.

MarketingOne enables teamwork across the organisation with rapid responses to changing circumstances. It helps you to integrate all your communications while allowing you to modify and add processes according to the requirements of your business.
data.product_description: We are Paragon. Experts in software creation at the intersection of Marketing, Communication and IT. We have been doing this for over 25 years. Our solutions for Brand management, Workflow management and Digital advertising are state-of-the-art. Brands such as Achmea, Booking.com, Deutsche Telekom, Heineken, Opel, Rabobank value us for our quality, innovation and personal relationships. Contact us and together we will make your project a sustainable success!

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MarketingOne?
What I like the most about MarketingOne is the quick and efficient way to track data intelligence through their system. It is very effective and up-to-date with real-world events.

What do you dislike about MarketingOne?
The one thing I dislike about MarketingOne is their customer support. They provide you with so much information; more often than not, you may have specific questions, and it takes a long time to hear back.

What problems is MarketingOne solving and how is that benefiting you?
They are solving the acknowledgment of research and analytical skills for businesses and their clients in the Latin America region ensuring they have the competitive edge needed for success.
